meanings.definition: The act of extending a body part beyond its normal range of motion.
meanings.sent1: After my injury, I had to do hyperextensions to improve my flexibility.
meanings.sent2: She regularly includes hyperextensions in her workout routine to strengthen her back muscles.
meanings.sent3: The yoga instructor joked that doing hyperextensions was like trying to touch the sky.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to fitness was evident in the way he pushed himself during hyperextensions.
meanings.sent5: The ballet dancer's graceful hyperextensions amazed the audience.

meanings.definition: A type of exercise that involves extending a body part beyond its usual range of motion to strengthen muscles.
meanings.sent1: Hyperextensions are great for targeting the lower back muscles.
meanings.sent2: Many athletes incorporate hyperextensions into their training regimen.
meanings.sent3: The fitness trainer demonstrated the proper form for hyperextensions to the class.
meanings.sent4: She felt the burn in her muscles as she completed a set of hyperextensions.
meanings.sent5: The weightlifter's powerful hyperextensions impressed the judges.
